item.title: [FLINK-22157] Join & Select a part of composite primary key will cause ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
item.description:
Add the following test case to org.apache.flink.table.planner.plan.stream.sql.join.JoinTest to reproduce this bug.

@Test
def myTest(): Unit = {
  util.tableEnv.executeSql(
    """
      |CREATE TABLE MyTable (
      |  pk1 INT,
      |  pk2 BIGINT,
      |  PRIMARY KEY (pk1, pk2) NOT ENFORCED
      |) WITH (
      |  'connector'='values'
      |)
      |""".stripMargin)
  util.verifyExecPlan("SELECT A.a1 FROM A LEFT JOIN MyTable ON A.a1 = MyTable.pk1")
}

The exception stack is
